sentence.Network_en: It was the first commercially available machine to employ artificial intelligence.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是第一台作为商品出售的采用人工智能技术的机器。

sentence.Network_en: Some of the commercially produced venison resembles beef in flavour.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些商业化养殖的鹿肉味道和牛肉很相似。

sentence.Network_en: Most poultry farmers have to rely on commercially manufactured feeds.
sentence.Network_cn: 多数饲养家禽的农场主不得不依赖商业化生产的饲料。

PerfectNetExp.abs: commercialize 使商业化commercially 商业上commercioganic 有市场的

although banks do typically run down capital in a recession , it is clear that they still do not command enough market confidence to borrow at commercially attractive rates .尽管银行有代表性的资本在萧条中开始下滑，显而易见，他们没有提供具有商业吸引力的利率以博得足够市场信心去借款。

the extension and use of railroads , steamships , telegraphs , break down nationalities and bring peoples geographically remote into close connection commercially and politically .铁路、轮船与电报的延伸与使用打破了国籍的限制，世界上地理位置相隔遥远的人们因此而在商业上与政治上紧密地被联系在一起。
bed processing was first used commercially in fluid catalytic cracking of crude oil in 1941 ., 早在 1941年 , 流化床工艺过程就第一次以工业规模用于原油的流化催化裂化.

list.abs: ... . . .两种简短格式将未平仓合约分为可报告(reportable)和非报告(nonreportable)可报告头寸包括商业(commercial)和非商业(non-commercial)套利与前次报告相比的增减变化各类持仓所占比例交易商数量等详.
高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... faith 信任；信念；忠实 commercial adj 商业的；贸易的 joy n 欢乐；喜悦：乐趣.
新概念第三册精解 ... ●nursery n. 育婴室，保育室 ●commercialization n. 商品化 ●inaccessible adj. 难接近的,达不到的.
市场营销英语词汇 - 豆丁网 ... Comdex 计算机展销会 commercialization 商业化 commitment 承诺.

entry.def: Commercial means involving or relating to the buying and selling of goods.

example.ex: Docklands in its heyday was a major centre of industrial and commercial activity...
example.tran: 港区在其最繁荣的时期曾是主要的工商业活动中心。

example.ex: Attacks were reported on police, vehicles and commercial premises.
example.tran: 据报道，警察、车辆和商业经营场所均遭到袭击。

entry.tran: (组织、活动)营利的，商业化的，偏重利润的
entry.def: Commercial organizations and activities are concerned with making money or profits, rather than, for example, with scientific research or providing a public service.

example.ex: British Rail has indeed become more commercial over the past decade...
example.tran: 过去10年来，英国铁路确实变得更加商业化了。

example.ex: Conservationists in Chile are concerned over the effect of commercial exploitation of forests...
example.tran: 对森林的商业开发所带来的影响让智利的自然资源保护者们感到忧心忡忡。

entry.tran: (产品)商品化的，供市场出售的
entry.def: A commercial product is made to be sold to the public.

example.ex: They are the leading manufacturer in both defence and commercial products.
example.tran: 在军工产品和民用产品的制造方面，他们都处于领先地位。

entry.def: A commercial vehicle is a vehicle used for carrying goods, or passengers who pay.

example.ex: Commercial vehicles, coaches and lorries are required by law to be fitted with tachographs.
example.tran: 法律规定商用车辆、长途汽车和卡车要安装转速计。

example.ex: ...the fastest crossing of the Atlantic by a commercial passenger vessel.
example.tran: 商用客船最快的一次横渡大西洋

entry.tran: (电视、广播)靠广告收入维持的，商业性的
entry.def: Commercial television and radio are paid for by the broadcasting of advertisements, rather than by the government.

example.ex: ...Classic FM, the first national commercial radio station.
example.tran: 国内首家商业广播电台——经典调频

entry.tran: (电影或音乐)商业化的，迎合大众口味的
entry.def: Commercial is used to describe something such as a film or a type of music that it is intended to be popular with the public, and is not very original or of high quality.

example.ex: There's a feeling among a lot of people that music has become too commercial.
example.tran: 很多人都觉得音乐变得过于商业化了。

entry.def: A commercial is an advertisement that is broadcast on television or radio.

example.ex: The government has launched a campaign of television commercials and leaflets.
example.tran: 政府通过电视广告和传单的形式发起了宣传活动。

auth_sentence.content: Greatest Hits, Rose Royce began to wilt commercially.
auth_sentence.res_content: Greatest Hits, Rose Royce began to wilt commercially.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Greatest Hits, Rose Royce began to wilt commercially.

auth_sentence.content: It's also very hard to get them commercially.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's also very hard to get them commercially.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's also very hard to get them commercially.

auth_sentence.content: It really needs to be a commercially viable network.
auth_sentence.res_content: It really needs to be a commercially viable network.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It really needs to be a commercially viable network.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加
instant立即的;紧迫的+ly……地→adv.立即地,即刻地
like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短+ly……地→adv.立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
sufficient足够的+ly……地→adv.十分地,充分地
undoubted无疑的,确实的+ly……地→adv.无庸置疑地,的确地
unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地
uniform贯的,一致的+ly……地→adv.一律地,均一地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

Sentence.sentence: Critics point out that, by giving Google the right to commercially exploit its database, the settlement paves the way for a subtle shift in the company's role from provider of information to seller.
The effect of policies generating long-term resource concentration has also created a distinctive set of universities which are research-led and commercially active

sentences.cn: 具有商业价值的专门技术

sentences.en: She was keen to exploit her discovery commercially.
sentences.cn: 她渴望把自己的发现用到商业上。

sentences.en: The laboratory is still owned by the government but is now commercially operated.
sentences.cn: 这个实验室仍为政府所有，但现在实行商业化运作。
